krpano.title: Hai trinh Truong Sa 04 2023

scene.name: scene01
scene.title: Tàu 571 chuẩn bị xuất phát
scene.onstart: aninfo(); set(layer[scenetitle].html, get(scene[get(xml.scene)].title)); asyncloop(true, mod(hx, view.hlookat, 360); if(((hx GE 15) AND (hx LE 115)) OR ((hx GE -345) AND (hx LE -245)), hieninfo1('spot1'); set(layer[tooltip1].html, get(scene[scene02].title));, set(layer[tooltip1].visible, false);););

scene.name: scene02
scene.title: Trên boong tàu 571
scene.onstart: aninfo(); set(layer[scenetitle].html, get(scene[get(xml.scene)].title)); asyncloop(true, mod(hx, view.hlookat, 360); if(((hx GE 70) AND (hx LE 170)) OR ((hx GE -290) AND (hx LE -190)), hieninfo1('spot1'); set(layer[tooltip1].html, get(scene[scene03].title));, set(layer[tooltip1].visible, false);); if(((hx GE -150) AND (hx LE -50)) OR ((hx GE 210) AND (hx LE 310)), hieninfo2('spot2'); set(layer[tooltip2].html, get(scene[scene01].title));, set(layer[tooltip2].visible, false);););

scene.name: scene31
scene.title: Nhà tưởng niệm Bác Hồ đảo Trường Sa
scene.onstart: aninfo(); set(layer[scenetitle].html, get(scene[get(xml.scene)].title)); asyncloop(true, mod(hx, view.hlookat, 360); if(((hx GE -130) AND (hx LE -30)) OR ((hx LE 330) AND (hx GE 230)), hieninfo1('spot1'); set(layer[tooltip1].html, get(scene[scene32].title));, set(layer[tooltip1].visible, false);); if(((hx LE 210) AND (hx GE 110)) OR ((hx GE -250) AND (hx LE -150)), hieninfo2('spot2'); set(layer[tooltip2].html, get(scene[scene33].title));, set(layer[tooltip2].visible, false);); if(((hx LE 180) AND (hx GE 80)) OR ((hx GE -280) AND (hx LE -180)), hieninfo3('spot3'); set(layer[tooltip3].html, get(scene[scene29].title));, set(layer[tooltip3].visible, false);););

scene.name: scene32
scene.title: Bia tưởng niệm trên đảo Trường Sa
scene.onstart: aninfo(); set(layer[scenetitle].html, get(scene[get(xml.scene)].title)); asyncloop(true, mod(hx, view.hlookat, 360); if(((hx GE 60) AND (hx LE 160)) OR ((hx LE -200) AND (hx GE -200)), hieninfo1('spot1'); set(layer[tooltip1].html, get(scene[scene31].title));, set(layer[tooltip1].visible, false);); if(((hx LE 200) AND (hx GE 100)) OR ((hx GE -260) AND (hx LE -160)), hieninfo2('spot2'); set(layer[tooltip2].html, get(scene[scene33].title));, set(layer[tooltip2].visible, false);); if(((hx LE 170) AND (hx GE 70)) OR ((hx GE -290) AND (hx LE -190)), hieninfo3('spot3'); set(layer[tooltip3].html, get(scene[scene29].title));, set(layer[tooltip3].visible, false);););

scene.name: scene33

scene.onstart: aninfo(); set(layer[scenetitle].html, get(scene[get(xml.scene)].title)); asyncloop(true, mod(hx, view.hlookat, 360); if(((hx GE 0) AND (hx LE 50)) OR ((hx LE 359) AND (hx GE 310)) OR ((hx LE -310) AND (hx GE -359)) OR ((hx LE 0) AND (hx GE -50)), hieninfo1('spot1'); set(layer[tooltip1].html, get(scene[scene34].title));, set(layer[tooltip1].visible, false);); if(((hx LE -100) AND (hx GE -200)) OR ((hx GE 160) AND (hx LE 260)), hieninfo2('spot2'); set(layer[tooltip2].html, get(scene[scene29].title));, set(layer[tooltip2].visible, false);); if(((hx LE -80) AND (hx GE -180)) OR ((hx GE 180) AND (hx LE 280)), hieninfo3('spot3'); set(layer[tooltip3].html, get(scene[scene37].title));, set(layer[tooltip3].visible, false);); if(((hx LE -115) AND (hx GE -215)) OR ((hx GE 145) AND (hx LE 245)), hieninfo4('spot4'); set(layer[tooltip4].html, get(scene[scene38].title));, set(layer[tooltip4].visible, false);); if(((hx LE 195) AND (hx GE 95)) OR ((hx GE -265) AND (hx LE -165)), hieninfo5('spot5'); set(layer[tooltip5].html, get(scene[scene31].title));, set(layer[tooltip5].visible, false);); if(((hx LE 175) AND (hx GE 75)) OR ((hx GE -285) AND (hx LE -185)), hieninfo6('spot6'); set(layer[tooltip6].html, get(scene[scene32].title));, set(layer[tooltip6].visible, false);););
